title: Engaging Cognitive Activities for Active Aging
summary: As an older adult, I want to access interactive games and cognitive activities through voice commands so that I can stay mentally active and engaged despite my physical limitations.

title: Motivational Physical Activity Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide me with guided exercises and challenges that respect my mobility limitations so that I can stay physically active and motivated without exacerbating my arthritis pain.

title: Cognitive Stimulation Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to engage in interactive cognitive stimulation activities so that I can remain mentally active and enhance my cognitive function while being supported by ALFRED.

title: Personalized Activity Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and social activities based on my interests and preferences so that I can stay socially connected and engaged with my community.

title: Tracking Engagement Progress
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my progress in physical and cognitive activities so that I can stay motivated and see how I am improving over time.

title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities based on my interests and past feedback so that I can stay socially connected and engaged in my community.

title: Customizable Scheduling for Activities and Events
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily schedule and customize my volunteering and social activities so that I can stay connected and engaged with my community despite my mobility challenges.

title: Health and Fitness Tracking Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health and fitness tracking devices so that I can easily monitor my physical activity and manage my health conditions without stress.

title: Activity Reminders for Staying Active and Engaged
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me of my scheduled physical activities and social events so that I can stay active and connected with my community despite my limited mobility.

title: Encouraging Family Participation in Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest activities I can do with my family so that I can stay socially connected and continue to enjoy shared experiences despite my mobility challenges.
